titleStmt.title: Distracted Englands lamentation, dangerously lying upon her sicke bed: with her last refuge for cure, unto the wholesome physicke of repentance and humiliation. Iuly 14. 1646. Imprimatur, Iohn Downame.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Harper at the Bible and Harpe in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
